select post_id, post_term, post_ccode, post_hw_id, post_week, post_chapter, post_answer_id, post_type, post_sno, post_priority, post_tag_01, post_tag_02, post_tag_03, post_tag_04, post_tag_05, post_tag_06, post_tag_07, post_tag_08, post_tag_09, post_tag_10, post_title, post_date, post_is_del, post_comment
, post_content
from post where post_term = #{term} and post_ccode = #{courseCode} and post_hw_id = -1 and post_chapter = -1 and post_week = -1
and (
${tagName} = '1'
)
and post_is_del = '0'
and post_answer_id is null
order by post_priority desc, post_id desc

with recursive tree_post as (select * from post where post_id = #{id} union all select post.* from post join tree_post on post.post_answer_id = tree_post.post_id) select * from tree_post order by post_date
